title: 'Great product but not satisfied'
body: Product is really great. Have really good quality and sturdy. But only thing I doesn't like is its wheels. I bought 4000 RS worth product. Wheels are not work on asphalt or irregular path ways. It stucks there. I had to buy black and Decker trolley which had really good big grippy wheels and have higher loading capacity with third of the price

title: 'Its good but not best'
body: 'The wheels have bush instead of bearings in wheels which makes the wheels wobble and also rivetted wheels
column5: which would create issues if needed a replacement. I would suggest to go for a bigger size 582 which has bearings in wheels and bolts with nuts for wheels and is better in stability and weight capacity. also metal pipes are lighter and of less dia. than 582. If you are ready to spend a little more go for the bigger 582 model.'
